item.title: The Other SALT Deduction That Needs to Go
item.description: The state and local tax deduction for corporations should be repealed in exchange for pro-growth corporate tax reform.

item.title: Farewell, Obi-Wan Kenobi
item.description: On knowing Tony Dolan, my secret source back in the day.

item.title: Activists Demand That Democrats Set Themselves on Fire
item.description: ‘Resistance’ reruns are all the rage, but are they working?

item.title: Peter Beinart’s Vicious Distortion of a Jewish Holiday
item.description: Only a moral drunkard could twist the Purim story of self-preservation to impugn Israel.

item.title: Another Plot Twist in Trump vs. the Administrative State
item.description: The latest chapter provides more hurdles for both Trump’s top-down and bottom-up efforts to bring the federal bureaucracy to heel.
